showScoreExcerpt:
"The piece is a quasi-monologue and I honestly think it would work better without the mostly visual presence of the other characters...And, let’s be honest, it’s impossible to look away from McDonald, even if society overlooked – and still overlooks – the Suzanne Alexanders of the world."
